name: Party Coffee Cake
description: This coffee cake is awesome and perfect for parties.

instructions.name: Preheat
instructions.text: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F. Grease and flour a 9x9 inch pan.

instructions.name: Mix dry ingredients
instructions.text: In a large bowl, combine flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.

instructions.name: Add wet ingredients
instructions.text: Mix in the butter, eggs, and milk.

instructions.name: Bake
instructions.text: Bake for 30 to 35 minutes, or until firm.
